title: Chester
desc: This hungry duo just wants a good, hearty meal! Despite the lack of arms, they're shockingly good at catching their prey, and cooking it! What, you think they eat it RAW? They're monsters, not animals! Chester spawned when a piece of cherry candy met experimental chemicals. The candy grew legs and knew one thing: hunger.
